name: Root reach (MediocerPlay)
description:
In this game you play as a tree using its roots to find water.

Use your mouse to manipulate the roots, guiding them to water and evading obsiticals. (only the closest root follows your mouse)

Make sure that you acquier steady source of water, as your tree constantly loses its water reserves as it grows. Also, avoid obstacles as hitting them removes a chunk of your water reserves in one fell swoop. 

When one of your roots touches a water pool it will slowly zap away at the reserve, the speed of the draining is corilated with how many roots touch the water source.

So by only using a few roots you can halt the errosion of your health, while using a lot of roots you can replenish your water resevers quickly, allowing you to heal after taking damage. 

Your tree will grow and split into more roots automatically when you collect enought water. This will consume a bit of your water and create more roots to control.
